word: H6380 - פֹּכֶרֶת צְבָיִים - Pôkereth Tsᵉbâyîym - po-keh'-reth tseb-awyeem' - Pochereth of Zebaim - போகேரேத்-செபாயிம்

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Pochereth of Zebaim / போகேரேத்-செபாயிம்
Pochereth of Zebaim = "here the cutting off"
Part(s) of speech: Proper Name Masculine / சிறப்புப்பெயர் (ஆண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From the active participle (of the same form as the first word) feminine of an unused root (meaning to entrap) and plural of H6643; trap of gazelles; Pokereth Tsebajim, one of the servants of Solomon: - Pochereth of Zebaim.
Cognate: H6378, H6379, H6380
